sk_summambitsec: I am a dedicated and compassionate Licensed Practical Nurse with --- year's continuous working experience in a nursing and rehabilitation setting. I am expert in rehabilitative patient care, treatment plan implementation, and post-surgery care. I am effective in monitoring patient progress to achieve optimum health goal. I am dedicated to the multidisciplinary team, including mentoring and educating new nurses. I am able to remain calm under pressure, perform necessary tasks quickly and correctly, and make appropriate decisions in emergency situations.
